avatar.description: Avatar next to the title bar

:backIcon.description: Customize the back icon, if false, the back icon is not rendered
:backIcon.description_zh: 自定义 back icon ，如果为 false 不渲染 back icon

:extra.description: Action area, located at the end of the title line
:extra.description_zh: 操作区，位于 title 行的行尾

:footer.description: The footer of the PageHeader, which is typically used to render the TabBar
:footer.description_zh: PageHeader 的页脚，一般用于渲染 TabBar

ghost.description: pageHeader, which will change the background color
ghost.description_zh: pageHeader 的类型，将会改变背景颜色

subTitle.description_zh: 自定义的二级标题文字

:tags.description: A list of tags next to title
:tags.description_zh: title 旁的 tag 列表

events.name: back
events.description: Return to the click event of the button
